
{{alias}}()
    Test if a value is a Buffer instance.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    y: boolean
        boolean indicating whether value is a Buffer instance.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( new Buffer( 'beep' ) )
    true

    > v = {{alias}}( new Buffer( [1,2,3,4] ) )
    true

    > v = {{alias}}( {} )
    false

    > v = {{alias}}( [] )
    false

    See Also
    --------
